JUDGES: André Potocki;Angelika Nußberger;Ann Power-Forde;Dean Spielmann;Elisabet Fura;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger
TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE .

On DATE the local electricity supply company , ORG , cut off the electricity in the applicant ’s house , allegedly because the electricity counter in his house was not properly sealed so the electricity used by him was not being properly metered . In DATE the applicant lodged a civil claim before ORG of LOC against O. , requesting that his house be re - connected to the electricity network , and claiming CARDINAL NORP hryvnas ( ORG ) ( at the material time MONEY ( ORG ) ) in compensation for non - pecuniary damage . The applicant alleged that without electricity he had not been able to properly store food , to cook and to relax in the TIME . He also claimed costs and expenses .

On DATE the court found in part for the applicant . The court ordered O. to re - connect the applicant ’s house to the electricity network , and awarded him UAH CARDINAL in compensation for non - pecuniary damage ( at the material time around EUR CARDINAL ) and ORG CARDINAL.CARDINAL ( at the material time around EUR CARDINAL ) in costs and expenses .

On DATE the ORG upheld this decision . O. appealed in cassation . The applicant stated that he had not been informed about it and had had no opportunity to comment on the defendant ’s appeal in cassation .

On DATE ORG of GPE , in the absence of the parties , quashed the above decisions in so far as they had awarded the applicant compensation for non - pecuniary damage , and rejected his claim for damages .
